name: Shentong Robot Education Group Co., Ltd.
description: Shentong Robot Education Group Co., Ltd. is a leading provider of robotics education solutions and products aimed at fostering innovation and technology in young learners. Established in 2015, Shentong focuses on integrating advanced robotics technology into educational programs, enabling students to develop skills in STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics). The company offers a wide range of educational products, including programmable robot kits, coding courses, and interactive learning platforms that are designed to engage students and enhance their understanding of robotics and artificial intelligence. Shentong’s mission is to cultivate the next generation of innovators and problem solvers through hands-on robotics experiences and comprehensive educational resources. The company has established partnerships with numerous schools and educational institutions, expanding its reach and impact on students across various age groups. With a commitment to quality and innovation, Shentong is at the forefront of the robotics education industry, continuously developing new products and programs to meet the evolving needs of educators and learners.

seo.meta_title: Shentong Robot Education Group | Innovating Robotics Education
seo.meta_description: Explore Shentong Robot Education Group, a leader in robotics education providing innovative products and programs that inspire young learners in STEM.

faq.question: What does Shentong specialize in?
faq.answer: Shentong specializes in robotics education solutions, including products and programs for schools.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Shentong?
faq.answer: Li Wei is the CEO of Shentong Robot Education Group.

faq.question: Where is Shentong headquartered?
faq.answer: Shentong is headquartered in Beijing, China.

faq.question: What types of products does Shentong offer?
faq.answer: Shentong offers robotics kits and educational programs focused on coding and AI.
